pullRequest.title: Add /warpinfo command
pullRequest.bodyText:
Get information about a warp.
Currently gets warp location

New permissions:
essentials.warplist - Access to /warplist command

commit.message:
Add warpinfo command
Get information about a warp

nodes.bodyText: Why is perm only checked if there are no args? Seems like a flaw to me
